intro: Become the king of Tokyo’s underground races!
description:
Welcome to Tokyo Racer X — the heart-pounding underground street racing scene where every corner you drift and every second you shave off your time brings you one step closer to becoming a legend. Dive into the glowing nightlife of Tokyo as you grip the wheel of finely tuned performance beasts and race through the city’s iconic streets. Whether you’re sliding sideways through tight corners, blasting down the expressway at breakneck speeds, or going head-to-head with the fiercest racers in the city, the road to glory is anything but easy. 

Key Features: 
- Blisterig Speed & Precision Drifting 
Test your reflexes and driving skill in races that demand full control. Pull off flawless drifts, time your nitrous boosts perfectly, and leave your rivals in the dust. 
- Rivalries with Real Stakes 
Meet a cast of rival racers, each with their own style, backstory, and attitude. Win races, earn respect, and challenge the city’s most feared crews in a story-driven campaign. 
- Build Your Dream Machine 
Customize your ride down to the smallest detail — body kits, performance parts, paint jobs, decals, and more. Whether you’re chasing speed, style, or both, your car reflects who you are on the street. 

Put the pedal to the metal. Own the streets. Think you’ve got what it takes to rise to the top?
